insertConnection(Connection) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.StartLogin

insertConnection(Connection) - Method in interface it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.StateVirtualView
 
insertConnection(Connection) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.View
The behavior of this method depends by state of the Virtual View: 1)If the virtual view is in the initial state: the method insert the connection in the list ,if there are three players connected it starts the timer to wait before to start the match 2)If the match is active and there aren't player disconnected : the method doesn't insert anything 3)If the match is active and there are player disconnected : the method insert a new connection only if the player was connected before.
InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI - Interface in it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View
This is the remote interface of Network handler RMI that being downloaded and used by server to send the request messages an to obtain the responses from a client.
